title: REMINDER - Ranked 2019 Split 1 ends this Sunday 21st April
body:
The first Ranked split of 2019 ends this Sunday night at 23:59 AEST for OCE players.

This means you have until this time to earn your Ranked Summoner Icon, Armour Upgrade, and Emote rewards before the second split starts and a new set of rewards becomes available to earn. Once the split ends, these rewards are unobtainable so make sure to get your last few ranked wins in before it's too late!

To check your current progress on split rewards, check out the Ranked tab under your Profile in the League client.

For more details on split rewards, see [this dev blog](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-au/2018/10/dev-diary-rewards-and-splits-in-ranked-2019/).

replies.body: If I hit diamond in this split will I be diamond over the next 2?
You don't reset when a split ends. It's only the rewards that change.

What ever happened to the special recall animation for Challenger players? Is that coming any time soon, and is it for players who end a season Challenger or is it something you have in the middle of a season as long as you maintain Challenger rank?
Not sure if this applies to you but I'm pretty sure only wins give SP.
So are those 3 rewards the only rewards we get or will we also get other rewards based on our rank at the end of the split?
Those are the split rewards. Each split will have new variations of these rewards, and there will still be yearly Victorious rewards at the end of the season.
do you have to play in all 3 to earn Victorious stuff

No. Your end of season ranking determines if you are eligible for the regular Victorious rewards.

Though there may be extra rewards depending on the rank you earned in each split. I don't believe this is certain, I just wouldn't count it out.

about the armor upgrade, will I not be gettting this specific part or just the stage of upgrade

from these images 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rPETvPBiVug

seems like there will be 3 upgrades for 3 splits, A: The main wings, B: The side wings and C: The sword

I know for certain that if I dont play this split I wont get A: The main wings

But I only start playing the last split will it be  A: The main wings or C: The sword
It looks like you would get B & C, with A not being available again
